WRITING.TEXT: I would love a remastered collection of the first two games (plus the vampire stand alone game). I miss inFAMOUS.
Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon
I honestly would love to be able to have all of the mainline series on PS4. XIII TRILOGY, a collection of 1-6 (original pixel art games) and VIII need to be made available.
NA please!
No. I #8217;ve been playing NBA 2k19 lately and the fans in my Pro seem to be going at full blast while I play.
Yes. Difficulty doesn #8217;t effect the trophies for GoW. There are also no missable trophies in the game.

No. You can just play through the game and, as you go, get the story trophies. Once finished, you will be able to go back through and get any collectibles you missed and complete any other tasks that you need to do for trophies.
This is a real controller. I have this controller myself. It #8217;s an official PlayStation controller, not a custom or off brand one.
This. I would assume they want to port over as many as they can, since we know that Doom 64 is coming.
I #8217;m confused...is this one not going to be a multiplayer only type of game like the previous two? Is it supposed to have more of a single player story mode?
I kind of hope this is real. It would be pretty neat playing an alternate version of MGSV

If it is going to be this gen then let #8217;s hope for a Gamescom announcement. If not then, the Game Awards seem like the last big place to announce it. I have a feeling next year #8217;s shows will be filled with next gen talk.
They have typically done PSX in December. It #8217;s unclear if they are doing it this year, as they didn #8217;t do one last year. If they have one then it is possible it would be revealed there.
Gamescom could really be it! It #8217;s felt like an eternity waiting for the next game to be announced.
Dollmaker
I don #8217;t have any hope that we will get a new SH anytime soon.
If this is from a GameStop, and it is legit, that date is likely just a placeholder date.
I keep seeing people say this and reference a #8220;list #8221; but I have yet to find definitive proof of this.
Oh I believe it #8217;s coming this gen. I meant people keep saying they aren #8217;t going to Gamescom.

Thanks for that. Looks like my hopes have been diminished a bit. The only chance is that maybe they show something during ONL but aren #8217;t actually going to be on the show floor? Now seems like the perfect time due to the 10th Anniversary.
I know it doesn #8217;t mean as much to WB Montreal, but it means a lot to the fans and to WB Games.

I wouldn #8217;t expect any announcements from western publishers (2k, WB). TGS tends to stick with announcements from Asian publishers. Some Sony stuff will likely be shown. Maybe even some things from Capcom, Square Enix, Konami and Sega.
This game looks amazing. NA PS4
Checking when last year #8217;s reveals started it was August 30, a Thursday. Maybe they will start the reveals tomorrow? I #8217;m getting antsy.
This is their last chance to sell me on this. So far, the gameplay looks boring.

If I see some gameplay that interests me, I will buy it. I love Kojima, and have high hopes for this, but I #8217;m passed the point in my life where I throw money at something for name alone. The gameplay so far hasn #8217;t been interesting. The darker toned trailers look awesome, but the weird #8220;strand, baby #8221; story elements look dumb.
The y specifically called it an experience, not a game or entry. Could just be a multiplayer mode for RE3 Remake or something else.
Glad to see a fellow Tony supporter. Cap is kind of a shitty dude in Civil War.
For anyone who hasn #8217;t spotted it, WB Games retweeted this. That was my reason for sharing.
That #8217;s exactly why I shared it. Glad you caught it. Also, one of the listed cities is Montreal. Maybe it #8217;s something, maybe it #8217;s nothing. We will find out in a few days.

1 PM Pacific time

Wow you look spot on!

A remastered trilogy for sure. I don #8217;t think we need a remaster of Shadow Fall.

In all seriousness though, I was thinking about getting it just because it #8217;s so cheap. I did grab Guacamelee 2 though.

I doubt it. It would be very unusual to have the promotional images uploaded to Sony #8217;s server and wait 6 months to reveal it. Plus, it sounds like this game is meant for PS4/Xbox One. E3 will have too much of a focus on next gen to announce something like RE3 there. It should be revealed this month, possibly in a State of Play or even at the Jump event.
My heart aches for that controller
Agreed. I got the God of War Pro last year. Really want this controller.
Silent Hill 2
Resident Evil 3 and Ghost of Tsushima for sure. Possibly Batman, if it isn #8217;t planned for Game Awards already.
It goes on for a while. 2-3 hours
Lmfao at this list. #8220;Banjo-Redooie #8221;? #8220;Crash Bash remake #8221;? GTA VI?! I very much doubt it.

When you say new Batman are you referring to the Telltale Batman re-release or the new Arkham? Also, Metroid Prine Trilogy rumors are swirling again. Resident Evil 2 #8220;Director #8217;s Cut #8221; also rumored (though I personally think it is not real).
It was teased by WB Montreal, who made Arkham Origins. People have been hoping for an actual trailer tonight but it isn #8217;t certain.
Well everyone, I guess it will happen on some random Tuesday 3 months from now.

Resident Evil Survivor. I was probably 6 or 7 years old. I HATED it. I couldn #8217;t understand why my friends were talking about Resident Evil so highly. After that I pretty much ignored the franchise until Resident Evil 5 was released. I played it and liked it, so I started doing my research on the series and found out Survivor was a spin-off. I guess it was a symptom of not readily having access to things like google and my dad buying me whatever game he saw with the name Resident Evil on it.

WRITING.TITLE: Favorite Silent Hill Bracket Poll

Sir Galahad - The Order 1886
Good luck! I actually plan on doing the same thing through 2020, with all of the RE games available on PS4.
Will do. I #8217;m sure RE5 and 6 will be a LOT easier with co op.
That sounds perfect!
Seeing as this email says #8220;unannounced title #8221; while also referring to last week #8217;s Game Awards, this must mean there is one more game to be announced. Possibly at The Jump event?
Personally, I think they should remake Code Veronica and 4. Then move on to remaking games in other series (Dino Crisis). RE8 should be released somewhere within that grouping as well.
I wish they would. My wife and I love playing together in split screen, but there hasn #8217;t been much this generation that uses it.
The poll apparently broke at the end. RE2 Remake won but it shows REmake as the winner.
I thought he used it for the first time in the Capra Demon episode of season 1.

Personally, I believed Ash would be real based on that first leak. Spawn was the one that had me in doubt, since so many of us had wanted him for years. If they were going to do a Hellraiser character then it would likely be Pinhead.
Probably RE4, which is fine. I want it. I was hoping for a CV remake first though

I personally disagree. Let me preface by saying I didn #8217;t play a RE game until 5, and didn #8217;t play 4 until it released for the 360. That being said, I think RE4 could do with a remake. Visual overhaul and allowing the player to move and shoot would be beneficial. 2 and 3 were VERY outdated by today #8217;s standards.
I #8217;m down for this. Sounds cool. Can #8217;t wait to hear more about it later this month.
I would kill for that God of War design! Great job!
The Undertaker?

This game just doesn #8217;t sound interesting to me. Monster Hunter World feels sluggish and clunky in my opinion, so that #8217;s not a plus when they say the gameplay is similar. Destiny 2 was boring as far as grinding for loot goes, so that #8217;s also not a good selling point. Beyond that, the aesthetic just doesn #8217;t look appealing. I #8217;m taking a hard pass on this game.
I agree. Hopefully we start seeing more PS5 games really soon because this just isn #8217;t doing it for me.
Man I hope it #8217;s announced soon. These teases that suggest something is coming, only for nothing to be said for weeks or months, are getting old. Looking at you WB Montreal...
Hell yes! Let #8217;s go!
All 3 are being called #8220;Definitive Editions #8221; so I wouldn #8217;t be surprised if 2 was being done this way as well.
I haven #8217;t been able to find screenshots from 2.
Thanks!
I see what you mean now. Mafia 1 definitely looks better. At least 2 has been improved. I can #8217;t imagine much being done to 3, though.
True.

Monday most likely. They have announced the last two state of plays only a couple days beforehand.
I doubt it. Expect AT LEAST a week. It #8217;s possible they push it out even further than that due to all of the events already happening next week.
I doubt it will be two months before the reveal event. That leaves 3 months for marketing if the console is releasing in November. Rumors going around suggest the event is being moved to June 12th.

Nintendo Wii. My girlfriend at the time (now my wife) has bought me a Xbox 360 for Christmas our senior year of high school. We decided to move in together once we graduated, so as a way to thank her for the Xbox I bought her a Wii.

PS5 event announced at 10:01 am. Last of Us Pt. 2 State of Play announced 12:09 pm. Ghost of Tsushima Stat of Play announced 12:01 pm. Times are all Central time. If they announce it today, I would expect around noon to be the latest. (Noon central)
Will be even longer for me since I don #8217;t get off work until 30 min after it starts. Throw in an additional 45 min to an hour to get home...
I think Ubisoft publishes the Hasbro games now.
Less than 3 months from console launch and it still feels like we barely have any news about it.
This is exactly the kind of post I needed to see. I started noticing mine earlier this year and I #8217;ve been so worried that I #8217;m going to go blind from it.
I don #8217;t even care about these teases anymore. I #8217;ll just wait for an actual trailer.

I #8217;ve been aware of mine since around April of this year. Some days are better than others. I can #8217;t imagine not having other people to compare my experiences with. I #8217;d feel like I was going insane.
I just want a new Alan Wake, leave the Control stuff out of it.
I don #8217;t get why people are so excited for this. Visually it looks stunning but based on the little bit of gameplay we have seen, it looks pretty boring.

WRITING.TITLE: Everyone #8217;s Xero Experience
WRITING.TEXT: Hey all, I was just curious if anyone here has listened to Xero in the past. In high school, about 13 years ago, I had burned a CD with the original EP on it (Reading My Eyes, Fuse, Stick N Move, Rhinestone). I noticed on the 20th Anniversary album, there is of course Dialate (which I know no one has heard) and Esaul. I have heard Esaul demos before but they are all with Chester, not Mark. Anyway was just curious what everyone #8217;s experience was listening to the Xero tracks.
Yeah they do sound pretty close. If LP decides to make new music, and want to bring in another singer, I think they could bring Mark back in. Though I don #8217;t know how practical that would be.
Hopefully with the Anniversary release they went in and cleaned up the sound a little bit. Like they did with She Couldn #8217;t.

The release dates don #8217;t align with previous Kim at packs. They wouldn #8217;t release the only two guest characters as the last two. It is typically switched back and forth. That, and they are more likely going to go for a 3 MK and 3 guest ratio as opposed to 4:2.

I get that. I personally have Enjoyed every release. I #8217;ve been a fan since I was 9 and saw the music video for #8220;In The End #8221;. My favorite album overall though is A Thousand Suns. I #8217;m pumped for the 20th Anniversary release and hope they do something similar for Meteora and MTM at least (maybe even The Rising Tied).
I #8217;m thinking it #8217;s going to be a new album. At least, I hope it is
I #8217;ve been refreshing google hoping for a track list for the last hour.
No unfortunately. My guess is it will be revealed with the first single dropping tomorrow.
I #8217;m not getting my hopes up. Not for Konami....not anymore.
Yes. Yes it was.
No. I didn #8217;t even really like MGS 5 to be honest with you. It didn #8217;t feel like Metal Gear to me
Is there any track commentary included? Specifically for the Forgotten Demos disc?
Ah that #8217;s kind of a bummer. I always enjoyed the track commentaries that were included in the Underground releases. Maybe Mike will make a video commentary for it.
Is that 107.9 in the Nashville area?
I #8217;d love to hear the #8220;folksy #8221; Somewhere I Belong demo. Before the guitar was reversed and chopped.
Definitely for Meteora and MTM. I would love it for ATS Hell even throw one in for The Rising Tied.
Did the Conjuring 2 in review get delayed?

WRITING.TITLE: My Ranking of Hybrid Theory #8217;s tracks
WRITING.TEXT: This is just my personal ranking of all the songs on Hybrid Theory. I #8217;m also going to throw in High Voltage and My December. 1. A Place for My Head 2. With You 3. Papercut 4. Crawling 5. My December 6. By Myself 7. Pushing Me Away 8. High Voltage 9. Forgotten 10. In The End 11. Runaway 12. Cure For The Itch 13. One Step Closer 14. Points of Authority So, what does everyone else think?
Haha POA has always been my least favorite song from the album
I didn #8217;t proofread haha. I #8217;ll edit it.
Nothing wrong with enjoying In The End. That #8217;s the song that got me hooked on LP

I #8217;ve never really liked POA. It #8217;s the one song on the album that I skip sometimes. I enjoyed One Step Closer back in the day but as time has gone on I #8217;ve liked it less and less. I also think that 1stp Klsr is a superior version to it.

I think Cure for the Itch just has a really cool vibe to it. POA has always been my least favorite on the album, I don #8217;t really have an explanation for why. As for OSC, I #8217;ve just heard it so many times that it #8217;s less enjoyable now. Plus I don #8217;t find it as unique as most of the other songs on the album.
Don #8217;t get me wrong, I don #8217;t think any of the songs are bad. It #8217;s just that POA and OSC are my least favorite. The album is fantastic overall.
Yeah I know they are b-sides. But when thinking about Hybrid Theory, most would throw those two tracks in with it.
